contacts.name: Elisabeth Staudinger
contacts.title: Member of the Managing Board, Head of Asia Pacific

company_info.description: Siemens Healthineers AG (listed in Frankfurt, Germany) is a leading medical technology company. They provide a comprehensive range of products and services in diagnostic and therapeutic imaging, laboratory diagnostics, and molecular medicine, with a strong focus on digital health and enterprise services. Their portfolio includes CT and MR imaging systems, ultrasound systems, X-ray products, laboratory analyzers, and point-of-care diagnostics, aiming to enable healthcare providers to increase value by expanding precision medicine, transforming care delivery, improving the patient experience, and digitalizing healthcare.

recent_news: February 2024: Siemens Healthineers launches the new AI-powered MAGNETOM Flow MR imaging system, designed to make MRI examinations faster, simpler, and more accessible.
January 2024: Siemens Healthineers and ScreenPoint Medical announced a collaboration to integrate AI-powered solutions into breast cancer screening workflows, enhancing diagnostic capabilities.

November 2023: Siemens Healthineers introduced the Atellica CI 1900 Immunoassay and Clinical Chemistry Analyzer, targeting smaller to mid-sized labs with a fully automated, compact system for increased efficiency.

email.subject: elevate MRI innovation
email.body:
Dear Mr. Montag,

Congratulations on the exciting February launch of Siemens Healthineers’ AI-powered MAGNETOM Flow MR system. This innovation, designed to make MRI examinations faster, simpler, and more accessible, truly underscores your commitment to advancing healthcare diagnostics and patient experience.

At [Your Company Name], we specialize in developing advanced AI platforms that optimize post-acquisition image processing and data analytics for next-generation medical imaging systems. We believe our proprietary algorithms, designed for seamless integration and scalability, could significantly amplify the groundbreaking diagnostic capabilities of MAGNETOM Flow, potentially reducing interpretation times and enhancing clinical insights across diverse applications.

Would you be open to a brief 15-minute call next week to explore how we might support Siemens Healthineers' continued leadership in medical imaging innovation?

Sincerely,

[Your Name]
[Your Title]
[Your Company]
